response.original_title: The Most Convenient Definitions: The Origins of the Brat Pack
response.overview: "The Most Convenient Definitions: The Origins of the Brat Pack" takes a look at the wave of young actors, many of whom were in The Breakfast Club, and looks at how they were dubbed "The Brat Pack" by writer David Blum, becoming a manufactured trend
response.title: The Most Convenient Definitions: The Origins of the Brat Pack
